name: ohmyfood
description: reservation restaurant and make menu online

scripts.prefix: postcss ./style/css/base --use autoprefixer -d ./style/css/base | postcss ./style/css/large-resolution --use autoprefixer -d ./style/css/large-resolution | postcss ./style/css/medium-resolution --use autoprefixer -d ./style/css/medium-resolution | postcss ./style/css/small-resolution --use autoprefixer -d ./style/css/small-resolution
scripts.build: npm run sass && npm run prefix
